sif3.common.conversion
Interface MarshalFactory

All Known Implementing Classes:
InfraMarshalFactory
public interface MarshalFactory

This class provides the interface for the Marshal Factories. Because the SIF3 infrastructure is independent from the data model all operations in this framework have been written with the assumption that the data model is unknown. For the framework to be functional, though, most lower level implementations require some marshal/unmarshal of objects to either XML or JSON. This interface defines that functionality, so that the low level classes can perform these operations without the knowledge of the actual data model.

Author:
Joerg Huber

Method Detail

marshalToXML

java.lang.String marshalToXML(java.lang.Object obj)
                              throws MarshalException
Marshal the given object to XML and returns the resulting XML as a String. If anything goes wrong with that marshal method then a MarshalException is returned.

Parameters:
obj - The object to be marshaled to XML.
Returns:
See description.
Throws:
MarshalException - Failure to marshal the object to XML.

marshalToJSON

java.lang.String marshalToJSON(java.lang.Object obj)
                               throws MarshalException
Marshal the given object to JSON and returns the resulting JSON as a String. If anything goes wrong with that marshal method then a MarshalException is returned.

Parameters:
obj - The object to be marshaled to JSON.
Returns:
See description.
Throws:
MarshalException - Failure to marshal the object to JSON.

marschal

java.lang.String marschal(java.lang.Object obj,
                          javax.ws.rs.core.MediaType mediaType)
                          throws MarshalException
Wrapper Method for the above two methods. This method can be called if the MediaType is known and based on which either XML or JSON is required. This marshal method must only support 'application/xml and application/json.

Parameters:
obj - The object to be marshaled
mediaType - Indicates what the object shall be marshaled into (JSON or XML).
Returns:
The String representation of the object.
Throws:
MarshalException - Failure to marshal the object.
